title: With 200,000 in 1 day, India skyrockets past 14M virus cases
description: NEW DELHI (AP) — India reported more than 200,000 new coronavirus cases Thursday, skyrocketing past 14 million overall as an intensifying outbreak puts a grim weight on its fragile health care...

title: Coronavirus India Lockdown Live News: Covid explosion! India sees over 2 lakh new cases in biggest-ever increase in 24 hours, 1000+ dead
description: Coronavirus Cases in India, Covid-19 Vaccination Tracker, Coronavirus India Lockdown Live: From tired doctors in Chhattisgarh to melting furnaces at the cremation grounds in Surat, every single city, town, the village has a tale of utter desperation and exhaustion.

title: Overcrowded Delhi Prisons Witness Massive Spike in COVID-19 Cases - The Wire Science
description: Over the last year, 500 cases have been reported from Delhi's three prisons, including two deaths.

title: News updates from HT: Delhi in a Covid-19 spiral amid calls for tighter curbs and all the latest news
description: Here are today’s top news, analysis and opinion. Know all about the latest news and other news updates from Hindustan Times.

title: COVID-19 Update: Lockdown, Night Curfew, Vaccination In Delhi, Mumbai, Bengaluru And More
description: COVID-19 updates from across India.

title: COVID-19: As deaths toll increases, Delhi's under pressure cremation sites struggle to keep up
description: The Qabristan one of Delhi’s largest burial grounds has been receiving over two dozen to three dozen bodies every day.

title: DDMA bars 'unnecessary interactions' among depts, agencies of Delhi govt
description: The Delhi Disaster Management Authority (DDMA) issued the orders in view of the consistent rise in COVID-19 cases in the city.

title: Alarm for Capital as new Covid-19 cases hit 17,000
description: Over the last two weeks, new cases in Delhi have increased by 586%, and the city now has over 50,000 active cases

title: Delhi in a Covid-19 spiral as experts call for tighter curbs
description: Delhi reports a new record in daily cases at 17,282, 104 die of Covid-19 in 24 hours. Over the last two days, new cases have increased by 586% and the city now has 50,000 active cases

title: Delhi records highest daily spike; Centre postpones class 12 CBSE board exams over Covid-19 scare | 10 points
description: The Covid-19 situation in India continues to worsen. On Wednesday, Delhi recorded the highest single-day spike in Covid-19 cases. Meanwhile, the Centre has decided to cancel CBSE board exams for class 10 and postpone the exams for class 12.

title: Over 17,000 cases, 7,000 containment zones: How Delhi's Covid-19 situation spiralled in April
description: At present, there are 7,598 containment zones in the city. Out of them, 6,689 are active containment zones. South Delhi has 1,732 containment zones, the highest among the districts.

title: Kailash Gehlot tests positive with Covid-19, third from Delhi cabinet to contract coronavirus disease
description: He also warned that if the situation is not reversed, then the galloping infection rate will eventually cause a huge strain on the healthcare system.

title: In India, a Second Wave of Covid-19 Prompts a New Exodus
description: Low-paid workers are starting to flee the cities en masse, just like a year ago. But their hometowns, often in far-flung places, may once again be ill prepared to test arrivals and treat the sick.

title: Delhi's Covid-19 crush: Government hospitals swamped at testing time
description: Government-run hospitals in Delhi are overwhelmed with Covid-19 patients and those who want to give their samples for testing. The crowds are so large that there is no adherence to social distancing and other Covid-19 protocol.

title: Delhi converts these hotels to 'extended COVID hospitals' amid surge: Full list
description: The Delhi government has also directed 19 private hospitals to reserve at least 80% of their ICU beds for COVID-related treatment.

title: Covid-19: Searching for a plasma donor? Delhi Police to the rescue
description: A group of constables have turned messiah for those who are in need of blood, plasma and platelets. Through a Facebook group, these Delhi Police personnel have come together, and are rising above their call of duty.

title: Air travel still the safest: Delhi International Airport CEO amid Covid-19 surge
description: 'We've ensured that the double-filtered fresh air is introduced inside the Terminal-3 every 10 minutes. Disinfection of surfaces being one using UV technology' says DIAL CEO.Delhi has been witnessing a surge in Covid-19 cases since the past few days

title: IPL 2021: Delhi Capitals’ Anrich Nortje reportedly tests positive for Covid-19
description: Nortje, who flew in to India along with fellow paceman Kagiso Rabada, is asymptomatic at the moment with results of a further test awaited later on Wednesday.

title: Delhi’s largest cemetery may soon run out of space to bury Covid-19 casualties
description: Delhi’s largest cemetery is almost out of space as the number of deaths in the city has spiked significantly in the last four days due to a surge in the Covid-19 cases.

title: COVID-19 impact: Jama Masjid area witnesses less crowd on first day of Ramadan
description: With a new surge, the national capital on Tuesday recorded 13,468 new COVID-19 cases. The general fear of coronavirus was perceptible as Jama Masjid area witnessed a fewer number of people.

title: Delhi Transport and Law Minister Kailash Gahlot tests positive for Covid-19
description: While Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal and Deputy CM Sisodia have received their first dose of the Covid-19 vaccine, the other Cabinet ministers are yet to get the jab.

title: Coronavirus: Delhi reports record 17,282 new cases, positivity rate at 15.9%
description: Meanwhile, the Ministry of Education announced that the school board exams for Class 10 are cancelled and postponed for Class 12.

title: Covid-19 fear takes sheen out of Navratri, Ramzan festivities in Delhi
description: During Ramzan, Muslims fast for a month between sunrise and sunset and perform special night prayers. The month culminates in the festival of Eid-ul fitr.

title: Delhi Metro fines 515 passengers in a day due to violations of Covid-19 norms
description: DMRC has also requested people in Delhi to strictly follow the new safety norms put in place to deal with the worsening situation of the capital

title: 52 Prisoners In Three Delhi Jails Under Treatment For COVID-19
description: Over 50 inmates and seven staff members in the three prison complexes of Delhi are presently undergoing treatment for COVID-19, officials said today.

title: Delhi Covid-19 update: 13,500 new cases in last 24 hours, says CM Kejriwal
description: On Monday, Delhi reported 11,491 new COVID-19 cases and 72 related deaths, the health department of the national capital said

title: Delhi, Maharashtra, 8 other states account for 80% of new Covid-19 cases
description: Maharashtra, Uttar Pradesh, Chhattisgarh, Delhi, Karnataka, Tamil Nadu, Madhya Pradesh, Gujarat, Rajasthan and Kerala have shown a rise in the Covid-19 daily cases, the Union Health Ministry said

title: India, big vaccine exporter, now seeks imports as COVID-19 cases soar
description: India on Tuesday said it will fast-track emergency approvals for COVID-19 vaccines authorised by Western countries and Japan, paving the way for possible imports of Pfizer, Johnson & Johnson, and Moderna shots.

title: Three Delhi HC judges test COVID-19 positive, another judge suffering from fever
description: The three judges, who were having mild symptoms, received their test reports yesterday, sources said, adding that they did not conduct the court on Monday.

title: Delhi Covid-19 testing labs at capacity, home collections hit
description: The Capital conducted over 100,000 tests thrice in the last seven days. In the first week of March, it was at an average of around 63,500 a day.

title: Covid-19 wave hits a new high in Delhi with 11,491 daily cases
description: The city on Sunday added 10,774 fresh cases, topping the previous peak of 8,593 infections recorded on November 11, during the third wave of infections.

title: Despite Covid-19 surge in Delhi, caution not in the picture
description: HT visited India Gate, Humayun’s Tomb, Delhi zoo and the Central Park at Connaught Place on Sunday and saw poor compliance with social distancing protocols at some places and poor mask hygiene at all the spots.

title: With 1,084 new cases, Gurgaon records highest ever single-day Covid-19 spike
description: With the spike on Sunday, there are now 5,549 active cases in the district, out of which 5,165 patients are in home isolation.

title: Covid-19: Over 2,500 people booked in Delhi for violating night curfew
description: The Delhi government on Tuesday had announced a 7-hour night curfew. The decision was taken after the Delhi Disaster Management Authority (DDMA) reviewed the COVID-19 situation in the city

title: Covid-19: Delhi reports 7,897 new cases, positivity rate over 10% and 39 deaths in last 24 hours
description: There were 7,897 new cases of coronavirus disease and 39 deaths due to the infection reported on Saturday, according to the daily health bulletin released by the Delhi government.

title: Covid-19: Delhi govt asks schools to postpone CBSE practicals till April 20
description: All colleges and coaching centres in the city will also be shut, due to the pandemic, Delhi education minister Manish Sisodia said. His comments came a day after the Delhi government ordered suspension of all in-person academic activities in city schools, leaving board students confused about their practical exams.

title: Delhi reports nearly 8,000 new Covid-19 cases, positivity rate crosses 10% again
description: Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal on Saturday said lockdown is not an option but some restrictions will be put in place in the national capital.Kejriwal said the administration and hospitals are working to contain the fourth wave of the pandemic in the city.

title: MHA decides to restart Delhi Cantt's Covid-19 centre as infections surge
description: Delhi reported 3,450 COVID-19 cases on Friday, taking the total number of active cases in the Union Territory to 26,631

title: Delhi, Haryana announce closure of schools amid COVID-19 surge
COVID-19: 35 doctors test positive at AIIMS Delhi
description: The national capital reported 7,437 new positive cases on Thursday, with positivity rate at 8.10 per cent. Active cases in Delhi stood at 23,181.

title: In 10 days, Delhi’s Covid-19 positivity rate jumps from 2.8% to 8.10%
description: Delhi recorded 7437 new cases of Covid-19 infection Thursday, the highest single-day spike since November 19 when the city saw 7546 cases of the disease.

title: Curbs in Mumbai, Bengaluru, Delhi and other cities as Covid-19 crisis deepens
description: Maharashtra, Chhattisgarh, Karnataka, Uttar Pradesh, Delhi, Madhya Pradesh, Tamil Nadu, Gujarat, Kerala and Punjab have shown a rise in the Covid-19 daily new cases

title: Delhi govt orders private hospitals to increase beds for Covid-19 patients
description: According to an signed by Dr RN Das, medical superintendent of Delhi’s nursing home cell, 115 hospitals with over 50 beds across the city have been asked to reserve 50% of their total ICU and ward beds for Covid-19, or 1.25 times the occupancy on Thursday, whichever is higher.

title: Delhi Covid: Capital records highest 1-day spike this year with 7,000 new cases
description: With todays, 7,437 fresh Covid cases and 24 deaths, the cumulative total reached 6,98,005 and the death toll rose to 11157.For two days in the trot, the city reported over 5,000 new infections

title: Coronavirus India April 6 Highlights: Delhi reports over 5,000 cases; DMRC issues new entry rules at metro stations
description: Coronavirus India Lockdown April 6 Highlights: Union Health Minister Harsh Vardhan to meet his counterparts from 11 hotspot states/UTs today; The meeting will also set the agenda for PM Narendra Modi’s Thursday meeting with state CMs and UTs administrators to discuss ways to contain the Covid-19 spike.

title: Coronavirus LIVE: Delhi sees 5,000-plus new cases; over 10,000 in Mumbai
description: Coronavirus live updates: Maharashtra reported 47,288 new coronavirus cases in the last 24 hours. Delhi govt has imposed night curfew in the national capital. Stay tuned for corona-related news

title: Coronavirus news highlights: 10,030 new COVID-19 cases in Mumbai, Delhi reports 5,100
description: Union Health Minister Harsh Vardhan will on Tuesday hold a meeting with health ministers of 11 states and Union Territories, which has been witnessing a surge in coronavirus cases, to review the situation there. These 11 states are Maharashtra, Chhattisgarh, Delhi, Gujarat, Haryana, Himachal Pradesh, Jharkhand, Karnataka, Madhya Pradesh, Punjab and Rajasthan.Get latest Healthcare online at cnbctv18.com

title: Amid rise in Covid-19 cases, Delhi govt orders increase in hospital beds
description: With hospital beds earmarked for the treatment of Covid-19 patients filling up fast, the Delhi government has ordered 11 government and 54 private hospitals of the national capital to increase the number of beds, orders issued by the Delhi government stated on Monday

title: Delhi records over 3,500 new covid-19 cases, positivity rate above 5%
description: The national capital's positivity rate shot up to 5.54% according to the health department.

title: COVID-19: Daily cases rise past 4000 in Delhi, ICU beds running out fast
description: Sunday marks repeat of highest toll this year, cases at a record high; over half of ICU beds with ventilators occupied
